TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's swarming with other people.

I wish I'd be a survivor of an apocalypse.

Granted. It is a nuclear apocalypse, and you have just a few days before radiation sickness'll get you.\

I wish I could finish what I

Granted. You have finished eating your bacon & eggs and now it's GONE!

ALRIGHT... I wish to live alone on a perfectly habitable place with wi-fi on Pluto.

Granted, Cabin sickness drives you mad and you commit suicide.

I wish for a potato cannon.

Granted, but it fires in the opposite way to what you would expect. You potato your face.

I wish to bother to actually visit Jool's moons.

Granted. You visit Bop and the space kraken gets you.

I wish for infinite wishes!

Granted. They are all horribly corrupted.

I wish for a wish that cannot be corrupted.

It gets destroyed.

I wish to be a keyboard.

Granted, however you are the musical variety. You are constantly bashed by UKIP and BNP for your success in the harmonic integration of ebony and ivory, so to speak.

I wish UKIP weren't winning the EU vote.

Granted. But then they win a UN vote.

I wish for a time machine!

Granted. You recieve a clock.

I wish for a TARDIS!

Granted! But It causes the Big Rip.

I wish to know what the X-37B was doing

Granted. Then your head explodes from the knowledges.

I wish that everyone had perfect grammar.

Granted! I wanz ta no wa tad ooo

I wish to own a Space Shuttle

Granted. You don't know how to fly it, and the operating system breaks when the cosmoplane is exposed to less than 0.9 atmospheres.

I wish for an indestructible plate.

granted, it is made of a deadly radioactive (but indestructible) material that gives you cancer

i wish that evolution worked faster

Edited May 21, 2014 by Helix935
wasn't done typing

Granted. Evolution is a slave to the Xenomorphs and you get devoured.

I wish that palladium made energy come out of nowhere in the form of heat.

Granted, but it turns earth into a star.

I wish for the creepy dude behind me to leave...

Granted. He leaves... with your wallet.

I wish for a better way to launch kerbals into semi-orbital trajectories with a cannon than having to simulate the cannon with a booster and a badly-made barrel.
Granted but it is so OP the are launched to 1 googolquadplex metres from the sun.

Your secret wish was granted. You died because you wanted to commit suicide (or at least the wishmaking fairy guessed so).

I wish to be swedish president. (Not Olof Palme)

Granted. But someone really wants the Swedish president dead all of a sudden. You get shot on the first day.

/Note to NSA - pls don't add me to your watchlist.

I wish I had some sort of machine that could grant me infinite wishes. Also, it has to be indestructible, only follow my commands and return to me by itself if I lose it.

Granted. Jebediah summons the Kraken and it destroys the physics engine rendering your machine useless.

I wish for a can of air.

Granted. You get a can of air, filled with soup. The can, being of air, is structurally unsound and breaks. The soup you put in it burns your hand.

I wish for a thermal separator. (just a regular old thermos)

granted, it is filled with radioactive material (polonium) that you drank

i wish for the ability to make better decisions
